intro.title: Welcome to Property Listing
intro.description: We'll guide you through listing your property in just a few simple steps.
intro.benefit2: Set your own prices and house rules
intro.infoText: You can save your progress at any time and come back later. Most hosts complete their listing in under 15 minutes.

intro.title: Let's get started
intro.description: We'll guide you through listing your property in just a few simple steps. You can save and exit at any time.
benefits: Set your own prices and house rules

propertyType.title: What type of property is this?
propertyType.description: Choose the option that best describes your place
propertyType.propertyTypeHelp: Select the type that most accurately describes your property

guestAccess.title: What will guests have access to?
guestAccess.description: Let guests know what spaces they can use
guestAccess.entirePlaceDesc: Guests have the whole property to themselves
guestAccess.privateRoomDesc: Guests have a private room, but may share common areas
guestAccess.sharedRoomDesc: Guests share a room with others
guestAccess.accessHelp: Be clear about what guests can access to avoid misunderstandings

details.title: Share some basics about your place
details.description: You can always change these later
details.detailsHelp: Accurate details help guests know what to expect

amenities.title: What amenities do you offer?
amenities.tipContent: Select amenities that accurately represent your property. Guests appreciate detailed information about what's available.
amenities.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one amenity

photos.title: Add photos of your property
photos.description: Upload at least 5 photos. The first one will be your cover photo.
tips: Include different areas of your space
photos.cameraRollPermission: Camera roll permission is required to select photos
photos.cameraPermission: Camera permission is required to take photos
photos.tipContent: High-quality photos are essential for attracting guests. Make sure your photos are well-lit and showcase your property's best features.
photos.photoSizeLimit: Photo size must be less than 10MB

title.title: Give your property a title
title.description: Catch guests' attention with a catchy title
title.titleHelp: A great title helps guests find and remember your property

pricing.priceHelp: Set different prices for weekdays and weekends

discounts.title: Offer discounts to attract guests

review.title: Review & Publish
review.description: Take a final look before publishing your listing
